contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of July, 2004, on certification by the Disciplinary Board that the respondent, KAREN GWYN MUIR, who was suspended by Order of this Court dated March 1, 2004, for a period of three months, has filed a verified statement showing compliance with all the terms and conditions of the Order of Suspension and Rule 217, Pa. R.D.E., and there being no other outstanding order of suspension or disbarment, KAREN GWYN MUIR, is hereby reinstated to active status, effective immediately.
